text: The Magnetic Fields (named after the André Breton/Philippe Soupault novel Les Champs Magnétiques)Morse, Erik. "The Magnetic Fields Get Real" , Interview Magazine, February 11, 2010. are an American band founded and led by Stephin Merritt. The band released their debut single "100,000 Fireflies" in 1991. ==References== ==Other websites== *The House of Tomorrow, official site of TMF & side projects * * *Aging Spinsters, a Stephin Merritt fan blog *Stephin Songs, an informative fan site *Strange Powers, official site of the TMF documentary Category:1989 establishments Category:American pop music groups
title: The Magnetic Fields
